    MEB Weights JMMI reporting Walkthrough

    MEB Weights

    meb_weights.Rmd
    library(qtb)

    Please note that the prices for items where the weight is 0 are collected but are not included in the calculation of MEB costs.

    Food Weights 

    meb_weights |>
  dplyr::filter(group == "food") |>
  gt::gt()
    item group label weight
    q_salt_price_per_kilo food Salt (1 kg) 1.0
    q_sugar_price_per_kilo food Sugar (1 kg) 2.0
    q_flour_price_per_kilo food Flour (1 kg) 0.0
    q_rice_price_per_kilo food Rice (1 kg) 10.5
    q_cmilk_price_per_200ml food Condensed milk (200 ml) 0.0
    q_pasta_price_per_500g food Pasta (500 g) 19.0
    q_couscous_price_per_kilo food Couscous (1 kg) 5.5
    q_gtea_price_per_250g food Green tea (250 g) 0.0
    q_lamb_price_per_kilo food Lamb meat (1 kg) 0.0
    q_tomatop_price_per_400g food Tomato paste (400 g) 15.0
    q_chickpeas_price_per_400g food Chickpeas (400 g) 0.0
    q_beans_price_per_400g food Beans (400 g) 15.0
    q_milk_price_per_liter food Milk (1 L) 8.5
    q_btea_price_per_250g food Black tea (250 g) 8.0
    q_oil_price_per_liter food Vegetable oil (1 L) 5.0
    q_tuna_price_per_200g food Canned tuna (200 g) 20.0
    q_eggs_price_per_30eggs food Eggs (30 eggs) 4.0
    q_chicken_price_per_kilo food Chicken meat (1 kg) 7.5
    q_bread_price_per_5medium_pieces food Bread (5 pieces) 32.0
    q_tomatoes_price_per_kilo food Tomatoes (1 kg) 10.0
    q_onions_price_per_kilo food Onions (1 kg) 7.0
    q_pepper_price_per_kilo food Peppers (1 kg) 4.5
    q_potatoes_price_per_kilo food Potatoes (1 kg) 12.0
    q_water_price_per_liter food Bottled water (1 L) 0.0

    Hygiene weights 

    meb_weights |>
  dplyr::filter(group == "hygiene") |>
  gt::gt()
    item group label weight
    q_hwsoap_price_per_piece hygiene Handwashing soap (1 bar) 9.0
    q_hsan_price_per_liter hygiene Hand Sanitiser (1L) 0.0
    q_ldet_price_per_litre hygiene Laundry detergent Â (liquid 1L) 1.3
    q_ssan_price_per_liter hygiene Antibacterial Surface Sanitiser (1L) 0.0
    q_diapers_price_per_30diapers hygiene Baby diapers (30 diapers) 0.0
    q_dsoap_price_per_liter hygiene Dishwashing liquid (1 L) 1.3
    q_toothpaste_price_per_tube hygiene Toothpaste (100 ml) 5.0
    q_lsoap_price_per_kilo hygiene Laundry powder 0.0
    q_shampoo_price_per_250ml hygiene Shampoo 0.0
    q_spads_price_per_10pads hygiene Sanitary pads (10 pads) 4.0
    q_toothbrush_price_per_brush hygiene Toothbrush (1 brush) 0.0

    Cooking Fuel weights 

    meb_weights |>
  dplyr::filter(group == "cooking_fuel") |>
  gt::gt()
    item group label weight
    q_fuel_public_price_per_11kg cooking_fuel public Fuel 11 kg 2
    q_fuel_private_price_per_11kg cooking_fuel private Fuel 11 kg 2
    cooking_fuel_price_per_11kg cooking_fuel cooking Fuel 11 kg 2

    Pharmaceutical Products weights 

    meb_weights |>
  dplyr::filter(group == "pharmaceutical") |>
  gt::gt()
    item group label weight
    q_paracetamol_price_per_12 pharmaceutical Paracetamol 500mg Â (Pack of 12 tablets) 0
    q_Ibuprofen_price_per_20 pharmaceutical Ibuprofen 400mg (Pack of 20 tablets) 0
    q_vitamin_b_complex_price_per_40 pharmaceutical Vitamin B Complex (Pack of 40 tablets) 0
    q_amoxicillin_price_per_21 pharmaceutical Amoxicillin 500mg (Pack of 21 tablets) 0
    q_metoclopramide_price_per_40 pharmaceutical Metoclopramide 10mg (Pack of 40 tablets) 0

    Gasoline Weights 

    meb_weights |>
  dplyr::filter(group == "gasoline") |>
  gt::gt()
    item group label weight
    q_public_gasoline_price_per_liter gasoline public_gasoline 1L 0
    q_private_gasoline_price_per_liter gasoline private_gasoline 1L 0
